blogPost.excerpt: Serverless Invoices is a free tool for invoice generating and management - no signup needed. Truly serverless, your data is safe with you in your browser. Export/import your invoices. It's open source, easy to modify, easy to deploy.
blogPost.body: Serverless Invoices is a free tool for invoice generating and management - no signup needed. Truly serverless, your data is safe with you in your browser. Export/import your invoices. It's open source, easy to modify, easy to deploy.
blogPost.title: Serverless Invoices - Free, serverless invoice generator - open sourced
blogPost.author: Marek

localize.description: Serverless Invoices是一款免费的发票生成和管理工具--无需注册。真正的无服务器，您的数据在您的浏览器中是安全的。导出/导入您的发票。它是开源的，易于修改，易于部署。
localize.tagline: 免费的、无服务器的发票生成器--开源的

localize.description: Serverless Invoices是一款免費的發票生成和管理工具--無需註冊。真正的無服務器，您的數據在您的瀏覽器中是安全的。導出/導入您的發票。它是開源的，易於修改，易於部署。
localize.tagline: 免費的、無服務器的發票生成器--開源的

previous.excerpt: CoinMarketCal is the leading economic calendar for reliable cryptocurrency news. It covers all events that help crypto traders make better decisions.
previous.title: CoinMarketCal - All crypto events that help crypto traders at one place

localize.description: CoinMarketCal是可靠的加密货币新闻的领先经济日历。它涵盖了帮助加密交易者做出更好决策的所有事件。
localize.tagline: 所有帮助加密交易商的加密活动都在一个地方进行。

localize.description: CoinMarketCal是可靠的加密貨幣新聞的領先經濟日曆。它涵蓋了幫助加密交易者做出更好決策的所有事件。
localize.tagline: 所有幫助加密交易商的加密活動都在一個地方進行。

next.excerpt: OtO is the first outdoor smart home device that:​ ​ - you can set to water EXACTLY where you want​ - applies environmentally-friendly fertilizers & pest control​ - saves you time, water, and money​ Plus, it’s solar powered! 🌞​
next.title: OtO Lawn - A smart sprinkler that makes sustainable lawncare effortless

localize.description: OtO是第一款户外智能家居设备，它可以： - 你可以设置在你想要的地方浇水 - 施用环保的肥料和害虫控制 - 节省你的时间、水和金钱，而且，它是太阳能供电的。🌞
localize.tagline: 让可持续草坪护理变得轻松的智能洒水车

localize.description: OtO是第一款戶外智能家居設備，它可以： - 你可以設置在你想要的地方澆水 - 施用環保的肥料和害蟲控制 - 節省你的時間、水和金錢，而且，它是太陽能供電的。🌞
localize.tagline: 讓可持續草坪護理變得輕鬆的智能灑水車
